manual:
【System Manual】

 • Interface Operation
1. Run Flow: Click the 'Start' button to begin the process.
2. Stop Flow: Click the 'Stop' button to stop the process.
3. Reset: Click the 'Reset' button to reset the canvas and state.
4. Zoom: Use the mouse wheel to zoom in or out.
5. Pan: Hold the right mouse button and drag to move the view.
6. View Details: Hover over a node to view its overview.

 • Advanced Control
1. Specify Start Point: Click any node (turns blue), and the process will start from that step.
2. Cut Flow: Hover over a connection line to display '❌', click to cut the path, and the process will stop at that point.

 • Setting Function (⚙️)
1. General Setting:
   - Python Interpreter Path: Specify the python.exe location.
   - Manual Content: Edit this manual and notes.
2. Flow Management:
   - Add/Delete Flow.
   - Edit Flow Title and Description.
   - Step Management: Add, delete, reorder, or import .py scripts as modules.

 • Status Indicators
     Blue: Waiting
     Deep Blue: Running
     White: Success
     Pink: Error
     Light Gray: Skipped
